doc.title: "The Boys" star Karen Fukuhara auditioned for the role of Atsu in Ghost of Y6tei, but she was declined the role due to having "Limited acting experience" - iFunny
doc.description: IFunny is fun of your life. Images, GIFs and videos featured seven times a day. Your anaconda definitely wants some. Fun fact: we deliver faster than Amazon.

main.p: "The Boys" star Karen Fukuhara auditioned for the role of Atsu in Ghost of Y6tei, but she was declined the role due to having "Limited acting experience"
Shes probably one of the best asian actors today. Playing a mute character requires you to be more expressive and she does it incredibly well
The woman who's the most emotional character in an insane popular tv show while being a fuckin mute can't act. Okay Sony. Have fun with concord round two.
